meanings.definition: To accompany or go along with someone or something.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys companying her friends to the park.
meanings.sent2: The dog was companying its owner on the walk.
meanings.sent3: The cat insisted on companying the family to the beach.
meanings.sent4: The gentle breeze companying the music made the evening magical.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of children companying the sound of waves created a joyful atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: The companying birds added to the peaceful ambiance of the garden.
meanings.sent2: The companying musicians played beautiful melodies during the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The companying clouds seemed to dance across the sky.
meanings.sent4: The companying stars twinkled brightly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The companying aroma of freshly baked bread filled the kitchen.
